articles.title: 'Mounting tensions' could see EU shelve Russia oil embargo - The Telegraph
articles.description: The European Commission is considering removing the ban on Russian oil from the latest round of sanctions due to opposition from Budapest
articles.content:
Hungary is seen as the final hold-out in the blocs bid to ban imports of Russian oil by the end of the year.

articles.title: Study finds cancer patients with COVID-19 at greater risk of hospitalisation and death - Hospital Healthcare Europe
articles.description: Cancer patients with COVID-19 have a greater risk of both hospitalisation and death following infection compared to those without the disease
